content: pink knee bend general abbreviations blue foreleg seam k = knit lime inner foreleg p = purl pale turquoise hind leg increase = increase baby pink rear end decrease = decrease red belly to thigh turquoise under foreleg k2tog/ k3tog = knit two together/ knit three together orange breast p2tog/ p3tog = purl two together/ purl three together yellow throat rh/lh = right hand/ left hand rs/ws = right side/ wrong side st/ sts =stitch/ stitches skpo = slip one stitch knit next stitch pass slipped stitch over knit stitch to decrease by one stitch kfb = knit into front then into back of stitch to increase by one stitch pfb = purl into front then knit into back of stitch to increase by one stitch new born puppy pattern page 5 new born puppy pattern page 6 head change to yarn cd head colour continue as follows beginning at the nose with yarn a nose colour cast on 3 sts work short row to shape top of nose row 1 purl short row 1 increase k1 kfb k17 kfb w+tk row 2 increase kfb k1 kfb - 5sts short row 2 p21 w+tp row 3 purl short row 3 increase k1 kfb k17 kfb w+tk row 4 increase kfb k3 kfb - 7sts short row 4 p21 w+tp row 5 purl short row 5 increase k1 kfb k17 kfb w+tk pm place markers on first and last stitch at the end of the last purl short row 6 p21 w+tp row for nose seam markers red short row 7 increase k1 kfb k17 kfb k4 to end of row change to yarn b muzzle colour continue as follows row 8 purl all 29 sts row 6 increase cast on 5 sts for left muzzle front knit across all 12 sts pm on first and last stitch at the end of the last purl row for left and right pm on first cast-on stitch for left muzzle front marker muzzle markers row 7 increase cast on 5 sts for right muzzle front purl across all 17 sts join yarn e continue with yarn cde changing to yarn cd as directed as pm on first cast-on stitch for right muzzle front marker follows work short row to shape muzzle - puppy s left side work short row to shape under puppy s left eye short row 1 increase kfb k5 w+tk wrap and turn knit - see page 4 short row 1 increase kfb k9 w+tk short row 2 p6 w+tp wrap and turn purl short row 2 p3 w+tp short row 3 increase kfb k4 w+tk short row 3 k2 w+tk short row 4 p5 w+tp short row 4 p1 w+tp short row 5 k17 to end of row short row 5 increase k2 in yarn cd kfb k5 kfb in yarn cde k12 to end of row work short row to shape muzzle - right side work short row to shape under puppy s right eye short row 1
